name: @signalk/signalk-to-nmea0183
description: Signal K server plugin to convert Signal K to NMEA0183

scripts.release: git tag -d v$npm_package_version ; npm run changelog && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'chore: update changelog' && git tag v$npm_package_version && git push --tags && git push

author: teppo.kurki@iki,fi
